ABGroupPM Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for ABGroupPM:

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 addItem ($row, $quantity, $priceObj)

Detailed Description

This module provides a group price where the customer must buy something from item group A *and* item group B to receive the associated discount (ex: buy salsa, save $0.50 on chips)

This is pricemethod 4 in earlier WFC releases and may not exist anywhere else.
